title: In 'Moone Boy,' Actor Chris O'Dowd Shares Memories Of Growing Up Irish
teaser: The Irish actor appeared in the film Bridesmaids and the TV series Girls. The third season of O'Dowd's British comedy series Moone Boy was recently released on Hulu. Originally broadcast May 29, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
